Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Texas in 1966...
Traded from Texas to New York (A) on 2/13/1970 (Going to NYY: LF C. May, P E. Sosa. Going to TEX: P M. Lolich)...
Injured on 5/24/1972 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/20/1973, off Dick Hughes (DET)...
Injured on 5/5/1976 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 5/21/1977 with a Sore Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
